headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get Triple Rewards on Valentine's Day Themed Modes
content:
Romance isn't the only thing in the air â€” all Till Death Do Us Part maps are dishing out 3X GTA$ and RP for the next week.

Plus, Shotgun Wedding, that small-scale Team Deathmatch set around the Paleto Bay chapel using only shotguns. It's a whole lot less of an ordeal than lawyering up, and it's paying out Triple Rewards all week long.
